definition: scissors/shears/clippers/CL:把[ba3]/to cut with scissors/to trim/to wipe out or exterminate
to stick/to paste/to post (e.g. on a blog)/to keep close to/to fit snugly/to subsidize/allowance (e.g. money for food or housing)/sticker/classifier for sticking plaster: strip
to catch sight of in a doorway (old)
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: Select the address string and copy it to the clipboard.
sentences.chinese: 选择地址字符串并将其复制到剪贴板。

sentences.english: Pastes previously copied or cut clipboard contents.
sentences.chinese: 粘贴先前复制或剪切的剪贴板内容。

sentences.english: Clicking on Copy will then transfer contents of edit box to clipboard.
sentences.chinese: 对复制，然后点击编辑框转移到剪贴板中的内容。

sentences.english: Metafiles are used primarily to transfer representations of vector graphic drawings through the clipboard.
sentences.chinese: 元文件最初用于通过剪贴板传递矢量图形绘制的图像。

sentences.english: Gives detailed information about Kanji currently on clipboard.
sentences.chinese: 获得关于当前剪贴板里里汉字的详细信息。

sentences.english: Participants stood with either a light or heavy clipboard cradled intheir arm, filling out surveys.
sentences.chinese: 参与者手持一个或轻或重的剪贴板站着填写调查问卷。

sentences.english: Sometimes the interviewers held a heavy clipboard, sometimes a light one.
sentences.chinese: 面试官有时举着快厚重的剪贴板，有时则轻举。

sentences.english: To ensure scannability, do not scale clipboard images in your document.
sentences.chinese: 为了保证可扫描性，不要缩放文档中的剪贴板图像。

sentences.english: Paste from Clipboard command is added.
sentences.chinese: 从剪贴板粘贴命令被添加。

sentences.english: Keyboard shortcut key for pasting the contents of the clipboard into the terminal.
sentences.chinese: 从剪贴板粘贴文字的快捷键。

sentences.english: Pastes from the clipboard a link to data in another application.
sentences.chinese: 从剪贴板粘贴到另一个应用程序中的数据的链接。

sentences.english: Mockups can be exported to clipboard or to a PNG file.
sentences.chinese: 原型可以输出到剪贴板或者导出为PNG格式。

sentences.english: This can be copied to the clipboard by double clicking the first mouse button.
sentences.chinese: 通过双击第一个鼠标按钮可以将其复制到剪贴板中。

sentences.english: SuperPaster is based on the Clipboard of the system.
sentences.chinese: 超级粘贴王是基于剪贴板的工具。

sentences.english: This copies the database link information to your clipboard.
sentences.chinese: 这会将数据库链接信息复制到剪贴板。

sentences.english: To cause to adhere by or as if by applying paste.
sentences.chinese: 从剪贴板粘贴到另一个应用程序中的数据的链接。

definition: Save As ... (menu option in a software application)
